items.title: Armor Types

content.label: Heavy Armor
content.description: Fixed AC value, no Dexterity bonus

items.note: Some armor gives Disadvantage to Stealth checks & some armor have Strength prerequisites.

items.title: Armor Class (AC)
items.content: Determines how easily you can be hit, either via agility or armor. Attack rolls must meet or exceed AC to hit. Increased by armor, magic, abilities, items etc.
